content: betwixt shawl shown in the lamb & kid elmer tweed and the lamb & kid birdie betwixt shawl by the lamb & kid conceptually inspired by the in-betweens of places and people the betwixt shawl is a top-down triangle shawl worked in garter stitch the wide stockinette stitch center spine gives it that center focus bringing both sides together the fabric is also greater than the sum of its parts the elmer tweed brings the texture the birdie the fluffy fun and they come together to make an out-of-this-world fabric you ll want to revisit time and time again finished measurements approx 76 / 190
